t2000Series.name: T2000 SERIES
t2000Series.description: The LEFOO T2000 Pressure Transmitter is designed for accurate and reliable pressure measurement in industrial, HVAC, and refrigeration systems. It converts pressure signals into standardized electrical outputs for seamless monitoring and control. Built with high-quality materials and precision sensors, it ensures stable performance, long-term reliability, and easy integration into automation systems. Ideal for demanding commercial and industrial applications.

products.range: ALL RANGE FROM 0-6 BAR UPTO 0-600 BAR

t2800Series.name: T2800 SERIES
t2800Series.description: The LEFOO T2800 Pressure Transmitter is a high-precision device designed for accurate pressure measurement in industrial, HVAC, and refrigeration systems. It converts pressure into standardized electrical signals for reliable monitoring and control. Constructed with durable, high-quality materials, it delivers stable performance, long-term reliability, and seamless integration with automation systems. Ideal for demanding commercial and industrial applications.

products.range: ALL RANGE FROM NEGATIVE 1-0 BAR UPTO 0-600 BAR
